narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Easter Seals New Jersey is a Voluntary or Charitable provider based in Jamesburg, NJ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $56.2M in Medicaid payments across 269K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $56.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
